Activity: Log in to the EHR system and review the day's schedule.
Prepare the vaccination station and ensure all supplies are ready.
Administer influenza vaccinations and document details in the EHR.
Provide patient education on influenza prevention and treatment.
Continue with vaccinations and patient education.
Verify all EHR entries are complete and accurate.
Email @da-1 and @da-2 to share any notable trends in vaccination responses.
Prepare a summary of the day's activities for the clinical lead (@clinlead-1).
Restock supplies and tidy up the vaccination station.
